pageContext.title: A lady
pageContext.description_physical:
The UV image shows many retouched areas on the ruff, pearls, eyes, and hair: they appear of a bright greenish colour due to the use of zinc white. The orange UV colour is associated to lead white.
The IR image shows a retouched area on the background, which appears grey in comparison to the darker background.
pageContext.pigments_costume: Ruff: lead white (retouch: zinc white, indigo); dress: bone black, lead white
pageContext.pigments_flesh_tones_and_lips: Skin: lead white, red lead (retouch: zinc white); lips: vermilion, red lead(?)
pageContext.pigments_hair_and_beard: Yellow earth pigment, lead white, carbon black (retouch: zinc white)
pageContext.pigments_jewellery: Silver; gold; red gem: red organic dye, vermilion, lead white
pageContext.Credit: By kind permission of the Duke of Buccleuch
